artifacts.name: Border Coin
artifacts.description: "Heads, I'll pretend I didn't see anything and let you go free. But tails..." Countless people have had their fortunes rely on this old gold coin.
artifacts.skilldesc: After using a non-attack skill, increases Attack by {{variable}} and Speed by {{variable}}. Effects can only stack up to 3 times.

artifacts.name: Ancient Dragon's Legacy
artifacts.description: A magical tool that can be used to move to a golden chamber filled with rare goods and weaponry that lie sleeping. Once unlocked, the tool allows one to access the passage to the treasure chamber from anywhere.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 15%. After the caster uses a non-attack skill, has a {{variable}} chance to increase Critical Hit Damage for 2 turns. Can be activated once every 2 turns.

artifacts.name: Bloodstone
artifacts.description: As I took a bite of the fruit, a red liquid spilled out. Instead of the copper smell of blood, the sweet scent of fruit emanated from it.
artifacts.skilldesc: After attacking, heals the ally with the lowest Health by {{variable}} of damage dealt.

artifacts.name: Abyssal Crown
artifacts.description: May those ruled by the crown walk the road of corruption forever. - Witch Reinwood, hung high up on the stake
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn after attacking.

artifacts.name: Blood-Seared Moon
artifacts.description: It is said that when Lunaris's distorted light shines red, the rage and bloodlust of wild beasts and vampires is at its height.
artifacts.skilldesc: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

artifacts.name: Creation & Destruction
artifacts.description: A scissor-like weapon that can be used as two separate swords, forged by the greatest blacksmith at Lilibet's request. In mockery of the official religion of Rekos, the blades are named after Cho and Mal, the demons of creation and destruction.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance for skill cooldown not to occur after using a skill.

artifacts.name: Bastion of Perlutia
artifacts.description: A divine weapon passed down in the Perlutia family that may only be wielded by those born to be leaders. It chooses its master of its own will and rearranges its dark, hexagonal pieces to take the form most optimal for any situation. It was locked away for decades with no one to wield it, but finally, it has found a new master to bring it back into the world.
artifacts.skilldesc: At the start of battle, grants the ally with the highest Attack immunity for 1 turn and a barrier equivalent to {{variable}} of the caster's max Health for 2 turns.

artifacts.name: A Little Queen's Huge Crown
artifacts.description: An enormous crown that Chloe carries with her for the moment when she becomes a true queen. She aspires to become a queen whose power is as impressive and glamorous as the crown itself. As for where and how she found it... That's Chloe's secret!
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage by {{variable}} if the enemy is granted a barrier when the caster attacks with a Single Attack.

artifacts.name: Dux Noctis
artifacts.description: "According to my mother, this necklace holds a wolf's power. That's why it shines brighter on nights you can see the moon clearly. It means the wolf will soon begin its relentless chase."
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Attack of the caster by {{variable}} when an ally makes a critical hit. Effect can only stack up to 8 times.

artifacts.name: Crown of Glory
artifacts.description: In the national swordsmanship tournament held to appoint an elite knight to protect the first in line to the throne of Lefundos, the winner, crowned with a laurel wreath, was neither the son of a noble family nor a veteran knight but an ordinary young man, not even twenty years of age.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Defense by {{variable}}. Removes 5 Souls from the enemy when the caster suffers an attack that targets all allies.

artifacts.name: Air-to-Surface Missile: MISHA
artifacts.description: Kanna's favorite missile. She holds it in her arms every night before she switches off to sleep mode, dreaming of the day she can finally use it.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Hit Chance by {{variable}} and Critical Hit Damage by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Dignus Orb
artifacts.description: "Whenever times are hard, I just look up to the sky, and it shows me the way forward."
artifacts.skilldesc: Grants a barrier equivalent to {{variable}} of Attack for 2 turns when the caster uses a non-attack skill and increases the damage of the next attack by 15%.

artifacts.name: Iron Fan
artifacts.description: "Ladies use fans for many purposes: hiding smiles, expressing feelings indirectly, and of course, eliminating enemies."
artifacts.skilldesc: Damage dealt increases by {{variable}} when attacking an Ice elemental target.

artifacts.name: Durandal
artifacts.description: The soft light emitted by the sword shields its owner from all injuries.
artifacts.skilldesc: When the caster's Health is 75% or less after being attacked, Combat Readiness increases by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Idol's Cheer
artifacts.description: I believe that music can change the world. Because it changed me!
artifacts.skilldesc: When attacked, increases Combat Readiness of the ally with the highest Attack by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Etica's Scepter
artifacts.description: When the empire is in its greatest peril, the exiled princess, Etica, will return with the five spirits to take back the royal hall and call down a rain of repentance to save the devastated world.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn at the beginning of the turn.

artifacts.name: Cruel Mischief
artifacts.description: Once upon a time, a girl's parents asked a mage to transform their tomboyish daughter into an elegant lady. He fulfilled their request, and the parents were thrilled to see how obedient she had become, not realizing she had been replaced by a doll.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage dealt in the Hall of Trials by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Elbris Ritual Sword
artifacts.description: A ceremonial sword handed down by the Elves for thousands of years, the blade is infused with several springs of magic. The person who owns this sword becomes the king of Elves.
artifacts.skilldesc: Has a {{variable}} chance to counterattack when an ally except for the caster is attacked.

artifacts.name: Alabastron
artifacts.description: A bottle that contains a mystical fragrant oil infused with the power of Lunaris. It is said that if you perform a purifying ceremony with this, you will be granted life as a sacred being.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the caster's Effectiveness by 35%. Has a {{variable}} chance to increase Speed for 1 turn at the end of the caster's turn.

artifacts.name: Guiding Light
artifacts.description: The bright star shining within the dark crystal resembles the North Star, and is determined to guide people through chaotic times.
artifacts.skilldesc: At the start of battle, grants stealth for 1 turn. At the end of the caster's turn, has a {{variable}} chance to grant stealth for 2 turns. Stealth granted at the end of the caster's turn can be activated once every 2 turns.

artifacts.name: Double-Edged Decrescent
artifacts.description: "Were the trusty sword on your shoulder to slip even slightly, it could slit your throat. The same is true of people—the closer you keep them, the more easily they're able to harm you."
artifacts.skilldesc: After attacking with a Single Attack, increases the caster's Attack by {{variable}}, with a {{variable}} chance to silence the enemy for 1 turn. Increased Attack effect can stack up to three times.

artifacts.name: Alexa's Basket
artifacts.description: A basket Alexa carries whenever she goes on a picnic with someone she wishes to become close to, containing everything necessary for a nice lunch in a beautiful forest. Just taking it along will elicit the joy of a pleasant picnic outing.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance each to grant increased Attack (Greater) and Critical Hit Chance to the caster for 1 turn at the start of the turn.

artifacts.name: Black Hand of the Goddess
artifacts.description: A glove made to maximize an enhanced mage's magic. It draws out limitless power so that one may fight against many. However, because it was made without consideration of the harmful effects it may have upon the wearer, the wearer suffers from terrible side effects.
artifacts.skilldesc: The caster's Critical Hit Chance and Critical Hit Damage increase by {{variable}} at the start of battle. Effect decreases by {{variable}} every time the caster attacks, down to {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Draco Plate
artifacts.description: "Isn't it ironic? That Dragon's skin and bones are now used to make armor to protect the very Dragon Knights of Wintenberg it cursed as it died." The queen laughed as she wiped the blood from her armor.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Damage by {{variable}} while decreasing damage suffered from critical hits by {{variable}}. When more than one similar effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

artifacts.name: Ms. Confille
artifacts.description: A long-range rifle owned by Elphelt Valentine. It is a special weapon that allows the bearer to change magic into bullets, and thus it allows any ordinary person to use powerful attacks.
artifacts.skilldesc: Has a {{variable}} chance to decrease Defense of the enemy for 1 turn after a Single Attack. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

artifacts.name: Crimson Moon of Nightmares
artifacts.description: It's hard to even venture a guess as to when this red marble was created. This marble creates the illusion that an immense full moon has risen in the sky, bringing forth the deep madness hidden within any who see it and trapping them in a never-ending hallucination.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Dual Attack chance by {{variable}}. When it is not the caster's turn, increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Shimadra Staff
artifacts.description: Let's end this together. - The Great Fallen Priest, Shimadra
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 20% and the effect of healing received by all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name. When more than one increased healing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

artifacts.name: Chatty
artifacts.description: I was once the best mercenary in the world!! Before Serila... No, master trapped my soul inside this lantern.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to be granted a barrier for 2 turns when the caster's Health is 50% or less at the moment the caster is attacked. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack. Can be activated once every 2 turns.

artifacts.name: Noble Oath
artifacts.description: An emblem given to members of Ezera's Orders after they pledge to dedicate their lives to the Goddess. Those given to knights resemble an escutcheon, while those given to priests resemble a rosary.
artifacts.skilldesc: As Health decreases, Defense and Effect Resistance increase by up to {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Celestine
artifacts.description: A rare ore extracted from near the Sanctuary. Known as the Blessing of Diche, it has the power to infuse the wearer with the energy of life and is carried by royalty and some high-ranking priests.
artifacts.skilldesc: Heals the ally with the lowest Health by {{variable}} when using a basic skill.

artifacts.name: Sword of Holy Light
artifacts.description: The soft light emitted by the sword shields its owner from all injuries.
artifacts.skilldesc: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

artifacts.name: Rod of Amaryllis
artifacts.description: Everyone who fights for the salvation of the world will have the divine protection of the Goddess.
artifacts.skilldesc: Heals the ally with the lowest Health by {{variable}} after using a non-attack skill.

artifacts.name: El's Fist
artifacts.description: While holding this gauntlet, you can destroy anything you touch, as if it had never even existed! - Guard Maid, El
artifacts.skilldesc: As Health decreases, Attack and Speed increase by up to {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Hell Cutter
artifacts.description: Look at this saw... isn't it awesome? - Notorious Lunatic, Ralakia
artifacts.skilldesc: Caster's Attack and Critical Hit Chance increase by {{variable}} whenever somebody's turn ends. Effect is removed after the caster attacks.

artifacts.name: Manifu
artifacts.description: A spirit that controls a body with no soul, instead of a doll. The body now contains the soul of a magician who failed in their attempt to harness Eternal Magic.
artifacts.skilldesc: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

artifacts.name: Cradle of Life
artifacts.description: "They say Humans do not require meaning to exist; therefore, they are capable of becoming free. Does that mean a being born with a specific purpose can never truly be free?"
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to inflict a random debuff for 1 turn after using a basic skill (Decrease Attack, Decrease Hit Chance, Poison, or Bleeding).

artifacts.name: Champion's Trophy
artifacts.description: A glorious trophy given to the winner of the 7th Beach Volleyball Championship. The prize also included fifty meal coupons for use at the summer festival.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}. {{variable}} chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn after using a basic skill. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

artifacts.name: Alencinox's Wrath
artifacts.description: The most vulnerable point on a Dragon's body is protected by their toughest scales. An accurate shot can kill a Dragon in an instant, but if you miss, their wrath will ensure you do not live long enough to regret it.
artifacts.skilldesc: Caster's Critical Hit Chance increases by {{variable}} whenever somebody's turn starts. Effect can only stack up to 20 times.

artifacts.name: Doctor's Bag
artifacts.description: A bag filled with medications that Ray made himself. Most illnesses and injuries can be treated by the medications within the bag.
artifacts.skilldesc: Dispels one debuff from all allies and recovers {{variable}} of each ally's max Health after using non-attack skills 3 times. Can only be activated once per battle.

artifacts.name: Justice for All
artifacts.description: A gauntlet made the year the first member of the Sharon family was knighted. It represents the pursuit of justice to be shared by all who follow the Goddess and the kingdom, rather than just for the sake of oneself.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to grant the caster a random buff for 2 turns at the end of the turn (Increase Attack, Defense, Speed, or Critical Hit Chance, Barrier, Immunity, Continuous Heal, or Critical Hit Resistance). Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

artifacts.name: Shepherd of the Hollow
artifacts.description: "To those fools who cannot be redeemed: kneel down, despair, and obey." Those who fell to his sword soon lost themselves and rose up as Dust Walkers.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Evasion by {{variable}}. Damage dealt increases by {{variable}} if the caster's Health is below 25% when attacking.

artifacts.name: Reingar's Special Drink
artifacts.description: A drink specially made in Reingar. With its pretty color and sweet scent, this drink is great for relaxation. They say this drink also enhances concentration, memorization, and judgment, but this hasn't been verified yet.
artifacts.skilldesc: When attacking all enemies, has a {{variable}} chance to inflict additional damage after attacking. Additional damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

artifacts.name: Knowledge Seed
artifacts.description: A capsule created in preparation for the final days of Politis's home planet, Paradia. It's a cache of Paradia's heritage that includes relics of their technology, knowledge, culture, and art so that their legacy can live on even if their planet disappears.
artifacts.skilldesc: Upon receiving lethal damage, has a {{variable}} chance to grant all allies except for the caster a random buff for 2 turns (Increase Attack (Greater), Increase Defense, Increase Evasion, Immunity, or Increase Critical Hit Resistance). Can only be activated once per battle.

artifacts.name: Proof of Valor
artifacts.description: "Though courage and daring may not be visible to mortal eyes, this insignia will act as proof of yours. From now on, everyone you meet shall know of your valor."
artifacts.skilldesc: Decreases damage taken by {{variable}}. Effect decreases by {{variable}} with each attack suffered, down to {{variable}}. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. This artifact can only apply to one Hero within a party.

artifacts.name: Necro & Undine
artifacts.description: Two sentient wings on Dizzy's back. When attacking, the green wing becomes Necro, a grim reaper, and the blue wing becomes Undine, an angel. Though their personalities often clash, both of them consider Dizzy's safety their highest priority.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} after using an attack that targets all enemies. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

artifacts.name: Manica of Control
artifacts.description: Sez's arm was modified and weaponized as part of an experiment in the past. After he escaped the facility, it grew more and more powerful until he could no longer control it. Sez considered this power a curse and used clothes and gloves to conceal his arm. After coming to realize this, the members of the Phantom CIC made him a special glove to help him control its power.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Hit Chance by {{variable}} and Critical Hit Chance by 15% on a Single Attack.

artifacts.name: Touch of Rekos
artifacts.description: An artifact handed down by the god Rekos after the Spirit Shrine was built. It is said that this item, containing the power of a god, is bestowed upon the most qualified shaman.
artifacts.skilldesc: Recovers the Health of all allies by {{variable}} after being attacked. This effect can only be activated once per turn. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

artifacts.name: Eternus
artifacts.description: "An eternal promise of perpetual confinement. Through endless cycles of death and rebirth, you will be intertwined." According to myth, the cursed archmage Heindel has spent thousands of years traveling the world to find a way to free himself from the ring's domination.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}} when a debuffed ally except for the caster starts a turn.

artifacts.name: Last Teatime
artifacts.description: "You finally found what you wanted, my lady." "Stop imposing on me, you fool." Oblivious to the events that would soon unfold before them, Baal smiled to himself when Sezan found the spell for the forbidden magic ceremony.
artifacts.skilldesc: When using an attack that targets all enemies, increases damage dealt by {{variable}}, with a {{variable}} chance to decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn.

artifacts.name: Rise of a Monarch
artifacts.description: "I will not forget—I am now the owner of a spear whose fate has been determined; of a coffin that will be filled by another." On that day, the heaviest weight in the world fell upon the shoulders of the bravest soul in Wintenberg.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Defense by 10%. At the end of the turn, grants a barrier equivalent to {{variable}} of the caster's max Health for 2 turns to the ally except for the caster with the lowest Health. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.

artifacts.name: Flower Shower
artifacts.description: The perfect magical tool for a girl who loves attention. Her sudden appearance in a shower of petals and a flash of light is like a dream, though for many it is more akin to a scene from a nightmare.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}. When an enemy is defeated, increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

artifacts.name: Celestial Spear
artifacts.description: This spear once wielded by the hero Nerendis is said to be powerful enough to pierce through the sky.
artifacts.skilldesc: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

artifacts.name: War Horn
artifacts.description: "The battlefield is full of frightened and terrified souls, but only defeat awaits those who fail to overcome their fears. Now, with the sound of this horn, transform those fears into courage."
artifacts.skilldesc: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

artifacts.name: Uberius's Tooth
artifacts.description: Treasure of the Wintenberg royal family made from the remains of wicked dragon Uberius. It's said to be capable of ripping dragon scale armor.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to inflict additional damage after a Single Attack. Additional damage increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

artifacts.name: Dust Devil
artifacts.description: "Once this long fight is over, will everything go back to the way it was?" mused the hero of the Dejurak desert with a deep sigh of anger.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to attack again with a basic skill when the target survives a basic skill attack. Can only be activated once per turn.

artifacts.name: Moonlight Dreamblade
artifacts.description: "Whether you take the path before you or not, it's all your choice to make," the White Shining Blade's voice whispered in my mind.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Evasion by {{variable}}. At the moment the caster is attacked, if the caster successfully evades, the caster is granted increased Attack for 1 turn.

artifacts.name: Rhianna & Luciella
artifacts.description: You're today's target. I'll let you know now that there's nowhere to run. - Moon Assassins, Rhianna and Luciella
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the turn. Can be activated once per turn.

artifacts.name: Bloodbead Dagger
artifacts.description: A dagger once used by an assassin that took many lives.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Damage by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Spirit's Breath
artifacts.description: Through them... I can feel it. The pain and agony in this world... It is said that only a few Shaman of Rekos can hear the Spirits' whispers.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to decrease skill cooldown by 1 turn when using a non-attack skill.

artifacts.name: Ranon's Memorandum
artifacts.description: A memorandum that contains all the records of magic researched by Ranon, the Mage. However, a spell is cast to show different content every time it's opened, so one must disable the spell to read the real content.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Speed by {{variable}} after attacking. Can stack up to 10 times.

artifacts.name: Mighty Yaksha
artifacts.description: If you really want to be strong, risk your life and challenge me.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Attack and Defense by {{variable}} when Health is 50% or more.

artifacts.name: Sword of the Sun
artifacts.description: A mysterious sword containing the power of light that grants its wielder continuous vitality.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Attack by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Ruby Essence
artifacts.description: Through these crimson fruits, I will gain eternal youth.
artifacts.skilldesc: Recovers {{variable}} of max Health at the beginning of the turn when the caster is debuffed.

artifacts.name: Venus Orb
artifacts.description: If you keep this orb with you, Venus's blessing will be with you.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Sword of Judgment
artifacts.description: "If you truly are innocent, then the Goddess will save you from my sword." Whether it is blood or the dark red of rose petals that falls in that next moment, it is unclear.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to attack again with a basic skill when the target survives a Single Attack. Can only be activated once per turn.

artifacts.name: Fairy Tale for a Nightmare
artifacts.description: A girl with a bouncy blue skirt dashes from place to place, just like a rabbit. Where could she be going? Perhaps the answer lies within a fairy tale.
artifacts.skilldesc: If the caster attacks when it's not their turn, deals {{variable}} fixed damage to the target.

artifacts.name: Sigurd Scythe
artifacts.description: As the moonlight revealed a figure holding a scythe, the astonished onlookers exclaimed "the God of Death has descended!"
artifacts.skilldesc: When the caster's Health is 50% or less, increases Attack by 25% and after attacking, absorbs {{variable}} of the damage dealt as Health.

artifacts.name: Iela Violin
artifacts.description: No matter how much power or darkness one wields, they're just a part of the audience. Iela started to play the violin and her melody touched the hearts of all that heard it. Even the genius mage who was only interested in fighting was moved.
artifacts.skilldesc: Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one buff from the enemy after attacking.

artifacts.name: Time Matter
artifacts.description: A source of power that Guardian Kazran wields that controls time. It can bring forth a time in the past that no one can remember.
artifacts.skilldesc: Reduces skill cooldown by 1 turn when an enemy is killed by an attack and increases the damage of the next attack by {{variable}}. Can only be activated once per skill.

artifacts.name: Love Potion
artifacts.description: It is said to be a magic potion of love, but in reality it is a potion that makes people honest about their innermost feelings.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the effect of all healing received by allies by {{variable}}. When more than one similar effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

artifacts.name: Demon's Pistol
artifacts.description: Legend says that anyone shot by this gun will become cursed.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Rosa Hargana
artifacts.description: Gun mage Amber Rose was an expert in lightweight magic and sharpshooting. Her magic bullets never missed, even when aimed at her own lover.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Dual Attack Chance by {{variable}} and increases Attack by 30% when it is not the caster's turn.

artifacts.name: Elyha's Knife
artifacts.description: Whenever Elyha, the leader of the Black Fog Company, wielded a knife, it got darker with blood and more brutal every time.
artifacts.skilldesc: Penetrates Defense by {{variable}} when attacking an enemy not at max Health.

artifacts.name: Fairy's Grimoire
artifacts.description: Take a good look at that spell book. The glowing letters that you find after a few pages are messages from fairies.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effect Resistance by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Rainbow Scale
artifacts.description: According to legend, a handful of Merpeople have rainbow-colored scales, which possess very powerful healing properties, capable even of bringing back the dead.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effectiveness and Effect Resistance of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

artifacts.name: Kal'adra
artifacts.description: A cursed weapon created by the fallen priest, Sestia. It causes a mental breakdown in the target by reminding them of their most painful memories. Even ages later, when fallen priests have sided with the Covenant, use of this mask is banned.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage dealt by {{variable}} if the target is debuffed when the caster attacks.

artifacts.name: Unfading Memories
artifacts.description: Diene always kept a dried forget-me-not in her pocket watch, shimmering with bright blue light as if it were picked only a day earlier.
artifacts.skilldesc: Heals all allies by {{variable}} after using a non-attack skill.

artifacts.name: Otherworldly Machinery
artifacts.description: For the people of Orbis, Yuna's cellphone is a peculiar item that they couldn't understand.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage of attacks that target all enemies by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Snow Crystal
artifacts.description: The specialty of Pathfinder Village, made of compressed ice that is kept from melting with a magic spell. Due to the mysterious, beautiful light they give off, they're often used to make lamps or other decorations.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effect Resistance by 20%. When the caster suffers a non-critical hit, increases Combat Readiness by {{variable}}. Can only be activated once per turn.

artifacts.name: Card of Small Miracles
artifacts.description: A New Year's card with a picture of Arky pulling a sled over a starry sky, on his way to grant the wishes of the people of Ritania. No matter how much time has passed, this card will help you remember your precious memories of that day.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Attack and Defense of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

artifacts.name: Circus Fantasia
artifacts.description: "I've mastered all kinds of acrobatics, so there's no performance beyond my abilities. Curious, aren't you? I'll invite you to see it for yourself!"
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the caster's Effectiveness by {{variable}} at the start of battle. Effect decreases by {{variable}} every time the caster attacks, down to {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Sword of Ezera
artifacts.description: "Because the color and shape is different to the holy sword wielded by the real life Ezeran legend..." The final part of the etching on the sword's hilt has been lost to time, but a mysterious force can still be felt flowing through the blade.
artifacts.skilldesc: Decreases damage suffered by the caster from Elite or Boss monsters by {{variable}}. When more than one similar effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

artifacts.name: Spear of a New Dawn
artifacts.description: This spear is said to have been used by a knight who reclaimed the throne and established a new kingdom. Legends say that whoever takes hold of this spear can begin a new era, and as a result, many covet the spear, but its whereabouts are currently unknown. However, there have been reports recently that a knight with silver hair wields a similar-looking spear.
artifacts.skilldesc: After using a basic skill, has a {{variable}} chance to inflict additional damage to the target. Additional damage increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

artifacts.name: Midnight Bloom
artifacts.description: A type of firework used at the Full Moon Festival Afterparty. Its blooms vary from huge explosions that illuminate the entire night sky to small bursts shaped like delightful plants and animals.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Chance of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

artifacts.name: Biting Wind Star
artifacts.description: A throwing star that flies as fast as the wind straight at the enemy's weak point.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Damage by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: New Year Cookies
artifacts.description: Arky heard that at the end of the year if you wear a red hat with white fur, you should give out presents to make people happy! Since Arky's such a generous Guardian, I will give Master a cookie! Just for today!
artifacts.skilldesc: Recovers Health of all allies by 10% at the start of the battle. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.

artifacts.name: Sword of Summer Twilight
artifacts.description: A sword given to Vildred by the eastern swordsman who taught him swordsmanship. It glows faintly when moonlight strikes its surface. It is known as the Summer Sword, one of the four swords crafted long, long ago.
artifacts.skilldesc: When using a skill that targets all enemies, penetrates the target's Defense by {{variable}}. When defeating an enemy with a skill that targets all enemies, increases Combat Readiness of all allies except for the caster by 10%.

artifacts.name: Secret Art - Storm Sword
artifacts.description: A book passed down through generations of Celine's family. It contains the secret to a form of sword art that allows one to channel the energy within their body to strike down their foes with lightning speed.
artifacts.skilldesc: Has a {{variable}} chance to grant increased Attack to the caster for 1 turn when an enemy uses a non-attack skill. Can only be activated once per turn.

artifacts.name: Samsara Prayer Beads
artifacts.description: "With this...will I grow stronger?" Old prayer beads of unknown origin passed down since long ago. It is said that depending on the nature of the wearer, it can grant partial control of natural power.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance each to grant increased Effect Resistance and Defense for 1 turn at the end of the turn.

artifacts.name: Merciless Glutton
artifacts.description: This blade's name is derived from the brutal scar it leaves behind, which makes it appear as though the victim's skin was torn by the bite of a giant beast. In order to effectively control the blade, a strength that goes beyond the realm of Humans is needed.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 15% when an enemy is defeated, with a {{variable}} chance to increase Effectiveness for 2 turns. Can only be activated once per skill.

artifacts.name: Twilight Calamity
artifacts.description: It is said that all those who looked into the brilliant twilight emitted by the staff drowned in a pool of light redder than blood.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Chance of all allies by {{variable}}, and increases Effectiveness of the caster by {{variable}}. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.

artifacts.name: Sepulcrum
artifacts.description: "All those who wander shall embrace death under my blade. My sword will be the gravestone of sinners." - Mary the Benevolent Punisher
artifacts.skilldesc: Decreases damage taken by {{variable}}. Effect increases by {{variable}} with each attack suffered, and can stack up to 3 times. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. The effect resets at the beginning of the caster's turn.

artifacts.name: Tagehel's Ancient Book
artifacts.description: A book written in the characters of the fallen Kingdom of Tagehel. Researchers are working hard to discover the meaning and principles behind the characters and unlock the mysterious power they hold.
artifacts.skilldesc: Acquires {{variable}} Souls at the start of the first battle.

artifacts.name: Infinity Basket
artifacts.description: Now, put your most expensive possession in this basket - it doubles! Put in two? Quadruples! This isn't a scam, trust me!
artifacts.skilldesc: For the duration of the caster's turn, increases Dual Attack chance of all allies except for the caster by {{variable}} and increases Attack of all allies except for the caster by 20%.

artifacts.name: Radiant Forever
artifacts.description: A flash appears with creation; a flare passes by with death. This crystal, created by a consolidation of all light within life, is said to have immense power.
artifacts.skilldesc: When using a skill that targets all enemies, increases damage dealt against Elite or Boss monsters by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Spooky Solayu Stories
artifacts.description: A book written by a ghost story aficionado. The first story features a sad little ghost girl who appears within a hazy beam of light.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Hit Chance and Effectiveness of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

artifacts.name: Santa Muerte
artifacts.description: There was nothing that Haste's scythe could not slay. The peaceful darkness could not stand in its way, nor even could life and death, until eventually he slayed even his own humanity.
artifacts.skilldesc: Decreases Combat Readiness of the enemy by {{variable}} after a single attack if the enemy is an Earth elemental.

artifacts.name: Elf's Bow
artifacts.description: A light and sturdy bow used by an elf from Dun Blyraia.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Chance by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Deadly Sword
artifacts.description: If you remove the sword from its sheath, you must kill someone with it. If you fail to do so, you will die.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Attack by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: One Year of Gratitude
artifacts.description: Orbis has completed one long orbit around Ilryos. To convey their feelings of gratitude to Heirs for protecting Orbis all that time, Ras brings a gift, wrapped by Arky, and a letter, written by Mercedes.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the EXP acquired by Heroes in the team by 10%. When more than one Artifact that increases EXP is equipped, only the strongest effect is applied, and this effect will not be applied when used via a Supporter. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.

artifacts.name: Violet Talisman
artifacts.description: As long as you believe in victory, the light of hope shall never fade. Remember that, my son. Our family's legacy now rests on your shoulders. - Violet's Father
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Attack by {{variable}} and Evasion by {{variable}} at the start of every turn. Each effect can stack up to 3 times, and resets at the start of battle.

artifacts.name: Water's Origin
artifacts.description: Wherever this talisman is, I will be too. To bring safety from storms, freedom from illness, life where once there was only ruin. - Shaman Cizette
artifacts.skilldesc: Recovers 8% Health and increases Combat Readiness by {{variable}} upon receiving damage equivalent to 20% or more of max Health at the moment the caster is attacked.

artifacts.name: Shepherds of Chaos
artifacts.description: New kinds of Unknown that came to Orbis through Chaos Gates. Their appearance and traits differ from that of the Unknown that previously appeared in Ritania. Most are acting under someone's command, and a few appear to possess some intelligence.
artifacts.skilldesc: As Health decreases, Evasion and Defense increase by up to {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Barthez's Orbuculum
artifacts.description: There is no need to ask me about the future. Now that you are my master, everything will unfold according to your desires. The future is in your hands.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to decrease damage received when attacked by 50%. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

artifacts.name: Ambrote
artifacts.description: After a final prayer, she took her bow made from the branches of the World Tree and leaped onto the battlefield full of death, wishing to restore the world in the belief that all things will be born anew.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage dealt by basic skill by {{variable}}. After using a basic skill, increases Speed by {{variable}}. Increased Speed effect can stack up to 5 times.

artifacts.name: Prophetic Candlestick
artifacts.description: It is said that you can see into the future by lighting a candle, putting it on this candlestick, and looking into the flame.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to reduce cooldown by 1 turn at the moment the caster is attacked. Can be activated once per turn.

artifacts.name: Unseen Observer
artifacts.description: A mobile data device created just for Flan. It supports hologram displays and allows Flan to access Politia's information network anytime, anywhere.
artifacts.skilldesc: After the caster uses a non-attack skill, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}} and acquires 10 Souls. Souls can only be acquired once.

artifacts.name: War Horn
artifacts.description: "The battlefield is full of frightened and terrified souls, but only defeat awaits those who fail to overcome their fears. Now, with the sound of this horn, transform those fears into courage."
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Attack of all allies by {{variable}}. At the end of every 3 enemy turns, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}}. This Artifact's skill effect can only apply to one Hero within a team.

artifacts.name: Staff of Wisdom
artifacts.description: A soul inside the staff will whisper ancient knowledge.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Torn Sleeve
artifacts.description: A torn sleeve out of which various weapons appear as though they are prosthetic limbs. She never has explained how she manages to fit so many things up there.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to inflict bleeding for 2 turns after a single attack.

artifacts.name: Aurius
artifacts.description: Legendary hero Knight Commander Rowell's tower shield.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Defense of all allies by 10%, and takes {{variable}} of the damage suffered by them. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name. When more than one damage distribution effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

artifacts.name: Andre's Crossbow
artifacts.description: "This crossbow has been modified to my own personal specifications. As long as I'm using this, there's no target I cannot hit."
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to remove 3 Souls from the enemy when the caster attacks with a Single Attack.

artifacts.name: Bloody Rose
artifacts.description: "I will steal that power from him and bring my family back from the dead, then he too will learn how it feels to lose everything. Just watch me."
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}} on a Single Attack. After attacking with a Single Attack, has a {{variable}} chance to inflict vampiric touch on the target for 2 turns. Vampiric touch effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

artifacts.name: Crimson Seed
artifacts.description: A token in the shape of the small flame emblem of Meldrec, used as proof of friendly relations and to show that an outsider has been granted passage through Meldrec by the great chief.
artifacts.skilldesc: Has a {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff after being attacked. Can be activated once per turn.

artifacts.name: Forest Totem
artifacts.description: A totem deep within the forest. Make a wish before it, and if you hear the clear ringing of a bell, your wish will come true.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to grant continuous healing for 2 turns at the moment the caster is attacked. Can only be activated once every 2 turns.

artifacts.name: Bloody Warhammer
artifacts.description: "I heard that weapon sucks up blood, don't you think it hosts an evil spirit?"
artifacts.skilldesc: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

artifacts.name: Holy Sacrifice
artifacts.description: The Statue of Grace is given to whichever knight wins the Goddess's favor and will save them from death once before shattering to pieces. Written by Barrett [Treasures of the Sacred Kingdom, 15p]
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to be revived with 25% Health and granted a barrier for 1 turn after dying. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's max Health. Can only be activated once.

artifacts.name: Magaraha's Tome
artifacts.description: An ancient book written by a great mage. It contains all of Magaraha's magical research. Due to its complicated content and massive volume, even those ambitious enough to try to read it all had to give up after turning only a few pages.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} after using a non-attack skill.

artifacts.name: Exorcist's Tonfa
artifacts.description: A powerful tonfa capable of smashing bones and splitting flesh. They say that when the wielders of this weapon die, their souls are bound to it.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage dealt by {{variable}} if the target's Health is 50% or more when the caster attacks.

artifacts.name: Wall of Order
artifacts.description: A device that can restrict access to certain districts under the authority of the police. Unless granted access from the authorities, no one can enter.
artifacts.skilldesc: At the start of the turn, for each buff granted to an enemy, has a {{variable}} chance to grant the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 1 turn. After using an attack that targets all enemies, increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 10%. This effect is not activated by a counterattack, Dual Attack, or extra attack.

artifacts.name: Golden Cocoa Cookie
artifacts.description: A dessert made for the festival by a famous chef using special golden cocoa beans that can only be found in the forests near Perland. It is famous for its sweet flavor compared to normal cocoa.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Hit Chance and Effect Resistance of all allies by {{variable}}. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

artifacts.name: Timeless Anchor
artifacts.description: They say that the ship held down with that anchor is able to endure all strong winds. - Written by Louis [The Adventures of Louis Van Vrista, Pg. 51]
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff at the moment the caster is attacked.

artifacts.name: Oath Key
artifacts.description: A key made in honor of the heroes who defeated the ancient monster, Nankuda, engraved with their oath to protect the world. - Philosopher Izet
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Hit Chance by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Dream Scroll
artifacts.description: Tell me what you want to dream. I can show you anything.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effect Resistance by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Enhanced Gauntlet
artifacts.description: A specially reinforced gauntlet that does not break, even after being hit with several attacks.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Defense by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Envoy's Pipe
artifacts.description: Look carefully at the smoke that rises from the pipe--you'll see within whether you're destined for paradise or hell.
artifacts.skilldesc: Decreases damage received by {{variable}} if the caster's Health is 50% or less when attacked. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

artifacts.name: Adamant Shield
artifacts.description: That damn shield can't be penetrated by anything. I guarantee you, cause even my sword couldn't. - Star Fencer Ayla
artifacts.skilldesc: Decreases Critical Hit Damage received by all allies by {{variable}}. When more than one similar effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

artifacts.name: Ascending Axe
artifacts.description: The swing of his axe was unstoppable; his enemies becoming an ever-growing pile of corpses. Written by Reingar Media Club [Special Edition: Testimony of Ancient Weapons 6, 44p]
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Critical Hit Chance of the caster by {{variable}} after making a critical hit. Effect can only stack up to 3 times.

artifacts.name: Tear of the Desert
artifacts.description: A jewel insignia that is made of Peridot found only in the nearby desert of Savara and granted exclusively to a few credited mercenaries by Basar himself. Adventurers of the desert covet it for its mystical blue glow that grows brighter as a sandstorm approaches.
artifacts.skilldesc: After using an attack that targets all enemies, increases Attack of the caster by {{variable}}. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

artifacts.name: Hilag Lance
artifacts.description: As she lifted her lance, a cry burst out from behind her. She believed she would soon be able to overthrow the Archdemon. "If I cannot do it, Goddess, give me the power to fight on forever."
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by {{variable}} after an ally except for the caster is attacked by a single attack.

artifacts.name: Stella Harpa
artifacts.description: An ancient relic of the Shandra Empire handed down between the High Priests and Priestesses of Constella. It is said that when the harp is played while singing, stars fall from the night sky and fireflies soar upward.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff from an ally when attacked.

artifacts.name: Aqua Rose
artifacts.description: This rose of eternal beauty grants great magical power to the possessor.
artifacts.skilldesc: 50% chance to grant a barrier to the caster equivalent to {{variable}} of max Health for 2 turns at the moment the caster is attacked. Can only be granted once every 2 turns.

artifacts.name: Succubus Mirror
artifacts.description: Be careful not to be seduced by the face in the mirror.
artifacts.skilldesc: MISSING_TRANSLATION_KEY

artifacts.name: Atma's Portal
artifacts.description: By going through that door, you can turn back time. It may be for a brief moment, but it's enough to gain momentum in a fight.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to decrease skill cooldown of all allies by 1 turn at the start of the battle.

artifacts.name: Ancient Sheath
artifacts.description: This magical sheath is said to keep any blade from losing its sharpness.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage dealt by basic skill by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Grail of Blood
artifacts.description: What wishes may be granted by this Death Goblet that holds the blood of so many victims?
artifacts.skilldesc: Recovers Health equal to {{variable}} of the caster's Attack at the start of the turn. Effect is increased by 50% when the caster's Health is 30% or less.

artifacts.name: Wind Rider
artifacts.description: Famously known as the Phantom Wind, Rinak would sneak into the mansions of the rich with ghost-like stealth and vanish with their most expensive possessions.
artifacts.skilldesc: When the caster defeats an enemy with an attack, casts stealth for 1 turn and increases Attack of the caster by {{variable}} for 1 turn at the start of their next turn.

artifacts.name: Portrait of the Saviors
artifacts.description: A portrait featuring the faces of the heroes who vanished after saving Orbis, drawn from Ras's memory by a famous Ezeran artist.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage dealt by {{variable}} if the target's Health is 50% or more when the caster attacks.

artifacts.name: Junkyard Dog
artifacts.description: A weapon created to embody the ability of the Outrage. It is a combination of the Fireseal and the Flashing Tooth, which is one of the Sacred Treasures, originally possessed by the Conclave on Sol's home planet.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to burn enemy for 2 turns after using basic skill.

artifacts.name: Alsacian Spear
artifacts.description: It is said that this spear contains the souls of the spirits who protect the forest, and grants strong protection to those who wield it.
artifacts.skilldesc: After attacking with a Single Attack, decreases Combat Readiness of the target by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Sashe Ithanes
artifacts.description: This is the Sashe Ithanes. It is a flame that will shake the world on its axis, that will destroy people, cities, kingdoms, even dreams. Take it, and in my name bring an end to everything.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by {{variable}} when the enemy is defeated. Effect does not stack with other Artifacts of the same name.

artifacts.name: Strak Gauntlet
artifacts.description: When the eclipse began, those small gloves started to spew fire and engulf my whole body. The spirit inside the gloves had woken up, and we were able to defeat the Archdemon. - Heir Aki
artifacts.skilldesc: Effect Resistance increases by {{variable}} when the caster's Health is 50% or more. When Health is less than 50%, the effect is halved.

artifacts.name: Sira-Ren
artifacts.description: This rare magical flower blooms from the corpse of a Human who possessed incredible magic power. It quickly withers away unless it is constantly being infused with powerful Mana. Few have been lucky enough to witness such a sight.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to inflict a random debuff for 1 turn after attacking (Decrease Attack, Decrease Hit Chance, Silence, Sleep, or Poison).

artifacts.name: To a New World
artifacts.description: Ras and the Heirs have been invited to a banquet in celebration of Ezeran Foundation Day. As they leave the hardships they suffered behind them, they raise their glasses in anticipation of a new, peaceful world.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases the EXP acquired by Heroes in the team by 15%. When more than one Artifact that increases EXP is equipped, only the strongest effect is applied, and this effect will not be applied when used via a Supporter. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.

artifacts.name: Devil's Brand
artifacts.description: As long as this brand is with you, the Devil will continue to protect you. - Cult Enforcer Ebarak
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by {{variable}} at the start of the turn. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.

artifacts.name: Egg of Delusion
artifacts.description: A dark egg containing demonic energy. Nobody knows what it may contain inside.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Defense by {{variable}} when Health is 50% or more.

artifacts.name: Daydream Joker
artifacts.description: Did you enjoy the world I showed you? Was it satisfying? Now, pay the price with your life.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases damage dealt by {{variable}} of the enemy's max Health when attacking.

artifacts.name: XVI. The Tower
artifacts.description: After suffering the pain of deceit and betrayal, the pillars of her heart collapsed, and as she escaped the prison of passion, she embraced the freedom of destruction. However, her greed is building a new tower that will imprison her once more.
artifacts.skilldesc: Deals {{variable}} fixed damage to the target after attacking.

artifacts.name: Firm Shield
artifacts.description: They say that the wielder of this shield doesn't back down from any situation, no matter how terrifying.
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Defense by {{variable}}.

artifacts.name: Goblin's Lamp
artifacts.description: If you allow yourself to be seduced by the faint light floating upon the lake, the demon in the water will reach out for you.
artifacts.skilldesc: At the start of battle, recovers Health of the ally with the lowest Health by {{variable}}. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

artifacts.name: Silver Rain
artifacts.description: After her shurikens poured down from the sky, the alley was awash with blood.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to increase Attack of the ally except for the caster with the highest Attack for 2 turns when the caster uses a non-attack skill.

artifacts.name: Cursed Compass
artifacts.description: Careful, it's a monster. Who knows what could happen if we go in the direction the compass is pointing. - Adventurer Laurelai
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Effectiveness by {{variable}} for 1 turn at the start of the battle.

artifacts.name: Steadfast Gatekeeper
artifacts.description: "This sword was forged not to take lives but to keep those within our castle safe. Never forget that our utmost duty is to prevent even a single drop of blood from being shed inside these walls."
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by {{variable}} when attacked by a skill that targets all allies.

artifacts.name: Butterfly Mandolin
artifacts.description: A mandolin used by Ludo, a pure-voiced minstrel. If you play it, you can see an illusion of butterflies made of light dancing.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to be granted an extra turn at the end of the next turn when attacked.

artifacts.name: Song of Stars
artifacts.description: As the strings start to vibrate, the starlight illuminates her.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance for an enemy to become targeted for 2 turns after a single attack.

artifacts.name: Sword of the Morning
artifacts.description: Only those with the power to control their inner energy can wield this sword. - Master Swordsman Rhynos
artifacts.skilldesc: Increases Attack and Speed by {{variable}} when Health is 50% or less.

artifacts.name: Labyrinth Cube
artifacts.description: A strange relic that was found in the mysterious maze of Farche Frontier. With mysterious light emitting from it, it has the power to distort space with impact.
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to increase the caster's Combat Readiness by 15% at the end of the enemy's turn.

artifacts.name: Wondrous Potion Vial
artifacts.description: A potion of love, or a potion of eternal youth. Only one of each exists in this world. Which do you choose? - A Senior Fellow of the Alchemy Society, Pei
artifacts.skilldesc: {{variable}} chance to dispel one debuff from an ally at the beginning of the turn.
